pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Xappt_QTQt/PyQt5 interface plugin for [Xappt](https://github.com/cmontesano/xappt.git)## ExamplesXappt_QT ships with a few example plugins that you can dissect. To load these plugins set an environment variable named XAPPT_LOAD_EXAMPLE_TOOLS to "1" before loading Xappt_QT.```bash$ export XAPPT_LOAD_EXAMPLE_TOOLS=1```These examples can be found in `xappt_qt.plugins.tools.examples`.
